articles.title: Europe is heading for Covid-19 'ceasefire' that could lead to 'enduring peace', WHO says - TheJournal.ie

articles.content: THE WORLD HEALTH Organization has offered Europe hope of a long period of tranquility and even enduring peace in the war on coronavirus, with a growing list of nations lifting almost all Covid curbs.… [+3909 chars]
